title: Introducing: veyns
content:
It’s always awesome when you stumble across an artist that already has a fairly significant back catalogue of songs.

London teenager veyns (Luke Johnston from Horror House) already has 30+ songs on his Soundcloud, all in varying degrees of completion and to differing qualities. Ranging from the relatively experimental (dare I say chillwave inspired) dusk, to the ambient beauty of tokyo, not forgetting his latest release, submarine, a track that a twisted Arthur Beatrice would be proud of; there’s more than enough to suggest that he’s a mightily talented kid. Check out a couple of personal favourites below, and more over at his Soundcloud.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
